text:
a series with no pattern as unstructured, as in there is no discernible time-dependent structure.
Alternately, a time series may have obvious patterns, such as a trend or seasonal cycles as
structured. We can often simplify the modeling process by identifying and removing the obvious
structures from the data, such as an increasing trend or repeating cycle. Some classical methods
even allow you to specify parameters to handle these systematic structures directly.
